attributes.action: Stop wasting time in parliament over trivial issues such as Russel Brand and Jonathan Ross
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The PM is today being questioned on PMQ regarding the recent incidents involving Russell Brand and Jonathan Ross.  This is not an issues for government to get involved in.  Sign this petition if you agree.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
